item.description:
Whether you are in school or not, we are all in “back to school” mode, packing away summer and starting anew for the Fall. Well it’s time to dig through that bead box and part with those beads and supplies that you never used and may never will … we recommend bagging and pricing your goods or you can work through it on the spot.

Light refreshments will be served.

Date: Wednesday, September 9 at 7pm
Duration: 2 hours

If you would like to donate your leftovers, we will bring them to either the Dana Faber Blum Resource Center or make them available to our young patrons. It’s your choice.

For more details, go to Abeille.us

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Bead Swap - Beads and Supplies - EVENT is FREE
